mapper.select: SELECT STADIUM_CODE, STADIUM_NAME, ADDRESS, SI_GUN_GU FROM STADIUM WHERE SI_GUN_GU LIKE '%'||#{condition}||'%' OR STADIUM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{condition}||'%'
SELECT STADIUM_CODE, STADIUM_NAME, ADDRESS, AREA, INFO, P.IMAGE1, P.IMAGE2, P.IMAGE3 FROM STADIUM S JOIN PICTURE P ON S.STADIUM_CODE = P.STADIUM_CODE WHERE S.STADIUM_CODE = #{stadium_code}
SELECT COUNT(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(GAME_DATE), 4, 2)) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE STADIUM_CODE = #{stadium_code} AND AWAY_RESERVATION = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE HOME_RESERVATION IS NOT NULL AND GAME_DATE > SYSDATE AND STADIUM_CODE=#{stadium_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STADIUM VALUES( (SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(STADIUM_CODE), 0, 2) || TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(STADIUM_CODE), 3)+1, 'FM0000') FROM STADIUM) ,#{admin_id},#{stadium_name},#{area},#{si_gun_gu},#{address},#{info})
